review: Talk about plug and play! I love this alternative to expensive cable. I love that I choose the channels I want to watch! I love the sleek, slim design and I love the remote. review: I purchased 2 refurbished Roku sticks from this seller and they were great, but one of them stopped working this week. We did nothing to the stick. It was just plugged into the back of our TV. Was working fine one day and the next day it was on the set up screen and would not move past the language set up screen. I emailed the seller to ask if he/she would be willing to let me send the stick back in the original box with all original packaging and have yet to receive a reply (I know I am outside of the return timeframe as it's been several months). When I purchase something, I expect it to last more than 3-4 months w/o breaking, so yes, I am a little irritated and would like a replacement. If this seller is ethical by an means, then I am hoping they will agree to let me return their bunk item and exchange it for a working item.
